name: StrongLoop
tag_list: node-js, node, distribution, distro, support, consulting, training
overview:
StrongLoop builds StrongLoop Node, the distribution of Node.js backed by commercial support plans, and offers consulting and training for Node.js.

StrongLoop Node is the only Node.js distribution to bundle with the Node.js Package Manager (NPM), a set of tested and supported community modules, along with a command-line utility to aide in the development of Node.js applications. StrongLoop Node has installers for Red Hat Enterprise Linux/CentOS 6.3, Debian/Ubuntu 12.10, Mac OS X Mountain Lion 10.8 and Microsoft Windows 7.

StrongLoop offers on-demand help for critical support incidents and consulting opportunities for deploying and running Node.js applications in production.

StrongLoop has formed the StrongLoop Technical Advisory Council to incorporate feedback from its membership, which includes enterprise companies employing Node.js at scale as well as established Node.js community leaders.
